Activity: Arrive at work, savor a cup of coffee, and reflect on the accomplishments of the week.
Check work email and address any urgent issues.

Conduct final testing of all three support channels (phone, email, portal), ensuring that they work seamlessly together and meet the needs of the hospital staff. @QATEST-1 @QATEST-2 Topic: Help Desk system testing.
Take a short break to listen to upbeat music and celebrate the progress made this week.
Document the setup and configuration process for all three support channels. To simplify the maintenance in the future.
Lunch break. Enjoy a meal with colleagues.
Address any remaining bugs or issues identified during testing.
Create a training guide for the help desk team, outlining how to use the new system and address common user issues. @helpdesk-1 Topic: Help Desk team Training on new system.
Collaborate with the training coordinator to schedule training sessions for the help desk team and other hospital staff. @Trainer-1 Topic: Staff Training Schedule
Write a summary report of the week's accomplishments and challenges, outlining the next steps for the help desk project.
Clock out and head home, feeling proud of the progress made and excited for the weekend.
